name: Unown Message
description:
Join Dr. Leto as she discovers and explores the Ruins of Alph, from the Pokémon universe. What starts off as an exciting discovery in the world of Pokéscience, quickly takes a turn for the worse as she makes one unsettling discovery after another. The ruins seem to be communicating with her, sending her a message...

Content warning: blood, animal cruelty, self-harm.

Music by: keyofw
